sqlMap.select:
select IC_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_CODE, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, IC_OWNER_TYPE, IC_OWNER_ID, IC_OWNER_CODE, IC_OWNER_NAME, PL_OBJECT_TYPE, PL_OBJECT_ID, PL_LOGIN_CODE, PL_OBJECT_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, SC_LOGIN_CODE, SC_LOGIN_NAME, IC_OBJECT_TYPE, IC_OBJECT_ID, IC_OBJECT_NAME, IC_LOGIN_CODE, REGISTE_TIME, HAPPEN_TIME, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_VAL, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_VAL, AFFECT_CODE, AFFECT_VAL, COMPLEX_CODE, COMPLEX_VAL, PRIORITY_CODE, PRIORITY_VAL, CC_LIST, BRIEF, DETAIL, RESPONSE_TIME, DEAL_TIME, REPONSE_DUR2, DEAL_DUR2, REPONSE_NUM, DEAL_NUM, RESTORE_TIME, REPONSE_DUR, DEAL_DUR, FINISH_TIME, IT_SOLUTION, FINISH_CODE, FINISH_VAL, FEEDBACK_CODE, FEEDBACK_VAL, FEEDBACK_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, IT_PHASE, IT_STATE_CODE, IT_STATE_VAL, DATA_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFY_DATE from IC_INCIDENT ii where data_state=1
and incident_code like '%$incidentCode:VARCHAR$%'
and brief like '%$brief:VARCHAR$%'
and sc_product_id = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
and affect_code in
#affectCode[]#
and class_code in
#classCode[]#
and PRIORITY_CODE in
#priorityCode[]#
and COMPLEX_CODE in
#complexCode[]#
and it_state_code = #stateCode:VARCHAR#
and REGISTE_TIME >= #registerTimeBegin:DATE#
and REGISTE_TIME <= #registerTimeEnd:DATE#
order by $orderBy$

select IC_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_CODE, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, IC_OWNER_TYPE, IC_OWNER_ID, IC_OWNER_CODE, IC_OWNER_NAME, PL_OBJECT_TYPE, PL_OBJECT_ID, PL_LOGIN_CODE, PL_OBJECT_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, SC_LOGIN_CODE, SC_LOGIN_NAME, IC_OBJECT_TYPE, IC_OBJECT_ID, IC_OBJECT_NAME, IC_LOGIN_CODE, REGISTE_TIME, HAPPEN_TIME, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_VAL, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_VAL, AFFECT_CODE, AFFECT_VAL, COMPLEX_CODE, COMPLEX_VAL, PRIORITY_CODE, PRIORITY_VAL, CC_LIST, BRIEF, DETAIL, RESPONSE_TIME, DEAL_TIME, REPONSE_DUR2, DEAL_DUR2, REPONSE_NUM, DEAL_NUM, RESTORE_TIME, REPONSE_DUR, DEAL_DUR, FINISH_TIME, IT_SOLUTION, FINISH_CODE, FINISH_VAL, FEEDBACK_CODE, FEEDBACK_VAL, FEEDBACK_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, IT_PHASE, IT_STATE_CODE, IT_STATE_VAL, DATA_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFY_DATE from (select ii.*,rownum rn from IC_INCIDENT ii where data_state=1
and incident_code like '%$incidentCode:VARCHAR$%'
and brief like '%$brief:VARCHAR$%'
and sc_product_id = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
and affect_code in
#affectCode[]#
and class_code in
#classCode[]#
and PRIORITY_CODE in
#priorityCode[]#
and COMPLEX_CODE in
#complexCode[]#
and it_state_code = #stateCode:VARCHAR#
and REGISTE_TIME >= #registerTimeBegin:DATE#
and REGISTE_TIME <= #registerTimeEnd:DATE#
order by $orderBy$ ) t where t.rn between #startIndex:DECIMAL# and #endIndex:DECIMAL#

select count(*) from (select IC_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_CODE, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, IC_OWNER_TYPE, IC_OWNER_ID, IC_OWNER_CODE, IC_OWNER_NAME, PL_OBJECT_TYPE, PL_OBJECT_ID, PL_LOGIN_CODE, PL_OBJECT_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, SC_LOGIN_CODE, SC_LOGIN_NAME, IC_OBJECT_TYPE, IC_OBJECT_ID, IC_OBJECT_NAME, IC_LOGIN_CODE, REGISTE_TIME, HAPPEN_TIME, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_VAL, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_VAL, AFFECT_CODE, AFFECT_VAL, COMPLEX_CODE, COMPLEX_VAL, PRIORITY_CODE, PRIORITY_VAL, CC_LIST, BRIEF, DETAIL, RESPONSE_TIME, DEAL_TIME, REPONSE_DUR2, DEAL_DUR2, REPONSE_NUM, DEAL_NUM, RESTORE_TIME, REPONSE_DUR, DEAL_DUR, FINISH_TIME, IT_SOLUTION, FINISH_CODE, FINISH_VAL, FEEDBACK_CODE, FEEDBACK_VAL, FEEDBACK_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, IT_PHASE, IT_STATE_CODE, IT_STATE_VAL, DATA_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFY_DATE from IC_INCIDENT ii where data_state=1
and incident_code like '%$incidentCode:VARCHAR$%'
and brief like '%$brief:VARCHAR$%'
and sc_product_id = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
and affect_code in
#affectCode[]#
and class_code in
#classCode[]#
and PRIORITY_CODE in
#priorityCode[]#
and COMPLEX_CODE in
#complexCode[]#
and it_state_code = #stateCode:VARCHAR#
and REGISTE_TIME >= #registerTimeBegin:DATE#
and REGISTE_TIME <= #registerTimeEnd:DATE#
)

select IC_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_CODE, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, IC_OWNER_TYPE, IC_OWNER_ID, IC_OWNER_CODE, IC_OWNER_NAME, PL_OBJECT_TYPE, PL_OBJECT_ID, PL_LOGIN_CODE, PL_OBJECT_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, SC_LOGIN_CODE, SC_LOGIN_NAME, IC_OBJECT_TYPE, IC_OBJECT_ID, IC_OBJECT_NAME, IC_LOGIN_CODE, REGISTE_TIME, HAPPEN_TIME, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_VAL, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_VAL, AFFECT_CODE, AFFECT_VAL, COMPLEX_CODE, COMPLEX_VAL, PRIORITY_CODE, PRIORITY_VAL, CC_LIST, BRIEF, DETAIL, RESPONSE_TIME, DEAL_TIME, REPONSE_DUR2, DEAL_DUR2, REPONSE_NUM, DEAL_NUM, RESTORE_TIME, REPONSE_DUR, DEAL_DUR, FINISH_TIME, IT_SOLUTION, FINISH_CODE, FINISH_VAL, FEEDBACK_CODE, FEEDBACK_VAL, FEEDBACK_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, IT_PHASE, IT_STATE_CODE, IT_STATE_VAL, DATA_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFY_DATE from IC_INCIDENT where IC_INCIDENT_ID = #value:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select IC_INCIDENT$$SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into IC_INCIDENT (IC_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_CODE, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, IC_OWNER_TYPE, IC_OWNER_ID, IC_OWNER_CODE, IC_OWNER_NAME, PL_OBJECT_TYPE, PL_OBJECT_ID, PL_LOGIN_CODE, PL_OBJECT_NAME, SC_OP_ID, SC_LOGIN_CODE, SC_LOGIN_NAME, IC_OBJECT_TYPE, IC_OBJECT_ID, IC_OBJECT_NAME, IC_LOGIN_CODE, REGISTE_TIME, HAPPEN_TIME, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_VAL, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_VAL, AFFECT_CODE, AFFECT_VAL, COMPLEX_CODE, COMPLEX_VAL, PRIORITY_CODE, PRIORITY_VAL, CC_LIST, BRIEF, DETAIL, RESPONSE_TIME, DEAL_TIME, REPONSE_DUR2, DEAL_DUR2, REPONSE_NUM, DEAL_NUM, RESTORE_TIME, REPONSE_DUR, DEAL_DUR, FINISH_TIME, IT_SOLUTION, FINISH_CODE, FINISH_VAL, FEEDBACK_CODE, FEEDBACK_VAL, FEEDBACK_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, IT_PHASE, IT_STATE_CODE, IT_STATE_VAL, DATA_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFY_DATE) values (#icIncidentId:DECIMAL#, #incidentCode:VARCHAR#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, #ccCustId:DECIMAL#, #custName:VARCHAR#, #scProductId:DECIMAL#, #prodName:VARCHAR#, #scModuleId:DECIMAL#, #moduleName:VARCHAR#, #icOwnerType:VARCHAR#, #icOwnerId:DECIMAL#, #icOwnerCode:VARCHARe#, #icOwnerName:VARCHAR#, #plObjectType:VARCHAR#, #plObjectId:DECIMAL#, #plLoginCode:VARCHAR#, #plObjectName:VARCHAR#, #scOpId:DECIMAL#, #scLoginCode:VARCHAR#, #scLoginName:VARCHAR#, #icObjectType:VARCHAR#, #icObjectId:DECIMAL#, #icObjectName:VARCHAR#, #icLoginCode:VARCHAR#, #registeTime:DATE#, #happenTime:DATE#, #sourceCode:VARCHAR#, #sourceVal:VARCHAR#, #classCode:VARCHAR#, #classVal:VARCHAR#, #affectCode:VARCHAR#, #affectVal:VARCHAR#, #complexCode:VARCHAR#, #complexVal:VARCHAR#, #priorityCode:VARCHAR#, #priorityVal:VARCHAR#, #ccList:VARCHAR#, #brief:VARCHAR#, #detail:VARCHAR#, #responseTime:DECIMAL#, #dealTime:DECIMAL#, #reponseDur2:DATE#, #dealDur2:DATE#, #reponseNum:VARCHAR#, #dealNum:VARCHAR#, #restoreTime:DATE#, #reponseDur:DECIMAL#, #dealDur:DECIMAL#, #finishTime:DATE#, #itSolution:VARCHAR#, #finishCode:VARCHAR#, #finishVal:VARCHAR#, #feedbackCode:VARCHAR#, #feedbackVal:VARCHAR#, #feedbackTime:DATE#, #closeTime:DATE#, #itPhase:VARCHAR#, #itStateCode:VARCHAR#, #itStateVal:VARCHAR#, 1, sysdate, #modifier:VARCHAR#, sysdate)
sqlMap.update: update IC_INCIDENT set INCIDENT_CODE = #incidentCode:VARCHAR#, SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#, CUST_NAME = #custName:VARCHAR#, SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#, PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#, SC_MODULE_ID = #scModuleId:DECIMAL#, MODULE_NAME = #moduleName:VARCHAR#, SC_OP_ID = #scOpId:DECIMAL#, SC_LOGIN_CODE = #scLoginCode:VARCHAR#, SC_LOGIN_NAME = #scLoginName:VARCHAR#, IC_OWNER_TYPE = #icOwnerType:VARCHAR#, IC_OWNER_ID = #icOwnerId:DECIMAL#, IC_OWNER_CODE = #icOwnerCode:VARCHAR#, IC_OWNER_NAME = #icOwnerName:VARCHAR#, PL_OBJECT_TYPE = #plObjectType:VARCHAR#, PL_OBJECT_ID = #plObjectId:DECIMAL#, PL_LOGIN_CODE = #plLoginCode:VARCHAR#, PL_OBJECT_NAME = #plObjectName:VARCHAR#, IC_OBJECT_TYPE = #icObjectType:VARCHAR#, IC_OBJECT_ID = #icObjectId:DECIMAL#, IC_OBJECT_NAME = #icObjectName:VARCHAR#, IC_LOGIN_CODE = #icLoginCode:VARCHAR#, REGISTE_TIME = #registeTime:DATE#, HAPPEN_TIME = #happenTime:DATE#, SOURCE_CODE = #sourceCode:VARCHAR#, SOURCE_VAL = #sourceVal:VARCHAR#, CLASS_CODE = #classCode:VARCHAR#, CLASS_VAL = #classVal:VARCHAR#, AFFECT_CODE = #affectCode:VARCHAR#, AFFECT_VAL = #affectVal:VARCHAR#, COMPLEX_CODE = #complexCode:VARCHAR#, COMPLEX_VAL = #complexVal:VARCHAR#, PRIORITY_CODE = #priorityCode:VARCHAR#, PRIORITY_VAL = #priorityVal:VARCHAR#, CC_LIST = #ccList:VARCHAR#, BRIEF = #brief:VARCHAR#, DETAIL = #detail:VARCHAR#, RESPONSE_TIME = #responseTime:DECIMAL#, DEAL_TIME = #dealTime:DECIMAL#, REPONSE_DUR2 = #reponseDur2:DATE#, DEAL_DUR2 = #dealDur2:DATE#, REPONSE_NUM = #reponseNum:VARCHAR#, DEAL_NUM = #dealNum:VARCHAR#, RESTORE_TIME = #restoreTime:DATE#, REPONSE_DUR = #reponseDur:DECIMAL#, DEAL_DUR = #dealDur:DECIMAL#, FINISH_TIME = #finishTime:DATE#, IT_SOLUTION = #itSolution:VARCHAR#, FINISH_CODE = #finishCode:VARCHAR#, FINISH_VAL = #finishVal:VARCHAR#, FEEDBACK_CODE = #feedbackCode:VARCHAR#, FEEDBACK_VAL = #feedbackVal:VARCHAR#, FEEDBACK_TIME = #feedbackTime:DATE#, CLOSE_TIME = #closeTime:DATE#, IT_PHASE = #itPhase:VARCHAR#, IT_STATE_CODE = #itStateCode:VARCHAR#, IT_STATE_VAL = #itStateVal:VARCHAR#, DATA_STATE = #dataState:DECIMAL#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate:DATE#, MODIFIER = #modifier:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_DATE = #modifyDate:DATE# where IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#

update IC_INCIDENT set MODIFIER = #modifier:VARCHAR#,MODIFY_DATE = sysdate
INCIDENT_CODE = #incidentCode:VARCHAR#
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#
CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#
CUST_NAME = #custName:VARCHAR#
SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#
SC_MODULE_ID = #scModuleId:DECIMAL#
MODULE_NAME = #moduleName:VARCHAR#
SC_OP_ID = #scOpId:DECIMAL#
SC_LOGIN_CODE = #scLoginCode:VARCHAR#
SC_LOGIN_NAME = #scLoginName:VARCHAR#
IC_OWNER_TYPE = #icOwnerType:VARCHAR#
IC_OWNER_ID = #icOwnerId:DECIMAL#
IC_OWNER_CODE = #icOwnerCode:VARCHAR#
IC_OWNER_NAME = #icOwnerName:VARCHAR#
PL_OBJECT_TYPE = #plObjectType:VARCHAR#
PL_OBJECT_ID = #plObjectId:DECIMAL#
PL_LOGIN_CODE = #plLoginCode:VARCHAR#
PL_OBJECT_NAME = #plObjectName:VARCHAR#
IC_OBJECT_TYPE = #icObjectType:VARCHAR#
IC_OBJECT_ID = #icObjectId:DECIMAL#
IC_OBJECT_NAME = #icObjectName:VARCHAR#
IC_LOGIN_CODE = #icLoginCode:VARCHAR#
REGISTE_TIME = #registeTime:DATE#
HAPPEN_TIME = #happenTime:DATE#
SOURCE_CODE = #sourceCode:VARCHAR#
SOURCE_VAL = #sourceVal:VARCHAR#
CLASS_CODE = #classCode:VARCHAR#
CLASS_VAL = #classVal:VARCHAR#
AFFECT_CODE = #affectCode:VARCHAR#
AFFECT_VAL = #affectVal:VARCHAR#
COMPLEX_CODE = #complexCode:VARCHAR#
COMPLEX_VAL = #complexVal:VARCHAR#
PRIORITY_CODE = #priorityCode:VARCHAR#
PRIORITY_VAL = #priorityVal:VARCHAR#
CC_LIST = #ccList:VARCHAR#
BRIEF = #brief:VARCHAR#
DETAIL = #detail:VARCHAR#
RESPONSE_TIME = #responseTime:DECIMAL#
DEAL_TIME = #dealTime:DECIMAL#
REPONSE_DUR2 = #reponseDur2:DATE#
DEAL_DUR2 = #dealDur2:DATE#
REPONSE_NUM = #reponseNum:VARCHAR#
DEAL_NUM = #dealNum:VARCHAR#
RESTORE_TIME = #restoreTime:DATE#
REPONSE_DUR = #reponseDur:DECIMAL#
DEAL_DUR = #dealDur:DECIMAL#
FINISH_TIME = #finishTime:DATE#
IT_SOLUTION = #itSolution:VARCHAR#
FINISH_CODE = #finishCode:VARCHAR#
FINISH_VAL = #finishVal:VARCHAR#
FEEDBACK_CODE = #feedbackCode:VARCHAR#
FEEDBACK_VAL = #feedbackVal:VARCHAR#
FEEDBACK_TIME = #feedbackTime:DATE#
CLOSE_TIME = #closeTime:DATE#
IT_PHASE = #itPhase:VARCHAR#
IT_STATE_CODE = #itStateCode:VARCHAR#
IT_STATE_VAL = #itStateVal:VARCHAR#
DATA_STATE = #dataState:DECIMAL#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:DATE#
where IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#
